document.name: Batch PURL Administration Form

functionality.item: Collect batch PURL information via a form for further processing.
Provide a REST API to allow for any action on a group of purls (create, modify or validate).

document.assumptions: This page is served by a Web server and is URL addressable.
document.preconditions: Requests for modification or deletion require that PURLs already exist.
document.postconditions: New PURLs may be created upon creation request.
